explanation: [0-0] In a football match, a player in a blue jersey dribbles the ball towards the goal, with several players in white jerseys watching him. A goalkeeper in grey sportswear stands in front of the goal, staring at the blue-shirted player with the ball. In the stands outside the pitch, many spectators are looking at the field. Above the blue-shirted player is a yellow caption "NEYMAR" and a green down arrow.

[0-5] A white-shirted player runs towards NEYMAR to intercept the ball. NEYMAR quickly moves the ball, causing the white-shirted player to lose his balance and fall behind NEYMAR, grabbing NEYMAR's body with his hand. NEYMAR, caught off guard, stretches out his hands and falls backwards. Then NEYMAR appears in the frame, beside him stands a referee in yellow. The referee looks to the right, NEYMAR waves his arms on his left, the referee turns his head to NEYMAR, raises his left hand, and looks to the right again.
